nodes.text: That's one way to get past a giant sea serpent. Bring the roof down.
There he lies, like a limp fish.
Looks like he was knocked out cold when I brought the roof down. I could try to help it...
Or I could use this situation to my advantage!
I'll see if I have anything on me that might help.
Nope, nothing that could aid the situation at hand.
Right. I'm not putting my mouth anywhere near those teeth.
It's hard enough trying to get a dog to swallow a pill, let alone a half-conscious Sea Serpent. I'll have to try something else.
This is a good idea, but this guy is huge, so I think I need something with more kick to it!
How many bandages would it take to wrap around the serpent's head? More than I have. Besides I think it's a concussion. I'd need something better than a bandage to heal this serpent.

options.text: Use Full Healing Potion on Serpent

nodes.text: Let's see if this will work...
There you go buddy. All patched up, I hope.
He's gone to take a nap - I hope he'll be all right now.

options.text: Put the Serpent out of its misery.

nodes.text:
If you face a sea serpent
And you don't want to drown
Or wind up as supper,
Just bring the roof down.
It's a method that's practically foolproof
As long as the serpent's not roof-proof.
A rogue needs to act when the situation is in his favor.
I'll just leave him be for now.
